replies.body:
#MakeQSSGreatAgain
I want to be able to fight outplay and survive, a lot of the time even if i am able to pull of an outplay the small amount of damage they got off that i cant dodge is enough to kill me and i die anyway, specially with a Zed ult if he's even somewhat fed he can kill me pretty easily, i just want to be able to have a way to counterplay that. I think you guys could have at least made it that QSS cleanses debuffs like slows and CC but then Mecurial scimitar removes things like Zeds Death mark, then as you said tanks wouldn't really be able to pick up that item to counter someone like Fioras ultimate, since its a pretty expensive item and not worth it for them, and ADCs can pick it up to have some kind of counterplay to all that damage, ADCs already have a massive target on their head, at least give them some more tools to help them survive certain death.

Build {{item:3157}} . I'm not kidding. The cost reduction makes it very worth on AP mids and almost justified on ADCs and other squishy AD champs.

Also {{item:3137}} still removes all debuffs, and the {{item:3140}} still just removes cc on Twisted Treeline.

Pretty much just make {{item:3137}} = {{item:3139}} is what you are saying

They were literally the same item originally, just that Dervish Blade was rethemed to fit the TT dynamic of "SPOOOOKY GHOOOSTS". Anyway, I think that making Dervish=Mercurial would be pretty good, given the state of assassins atm.

Okay, So I have played two games with my Level 5 Zed now and I have the 2 tokens I needed to craft a level 6 mastery for him in the Hextech shop. But it also said I needed a Zed Permanent (which I assume means I need to own him which I do) and apparently I can't craft the Level 6 mastery. I don't know what to do please help. {{champion:238}} {{item:3070}}

You know how you can get champions from hextech craft? You can get the champ that you own as well as loot. That is what it means by zed permanent. So unless you have him as loot already your only choice is to spend 500 blue shards. They really need to work on rewording that because it is confusing.
It looks like you need to combine the tokens with Zed's champ shard, blue essence or permanent loot.
Super galaxy Ekko? Ffs riot make him a good skin
They won't be able too ;( they already have fizz as mid champ, shyvana as jungle & rumble as top wahahaha. Super Galaxy Ekko would have been fore instead of shyvana
Ikr I really want a new Ekko skin! academy Ekko is a waste of money because theres nothing different, so that leaves him with sandstorm Ekko as his only good skin!
you mean fizz?
Cheers, Can't wait to try out AP build for these champs now {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{champion:9}}  can be a scarecrow but {{champion:54}} cant be a rock?

> Taliyah is struggling to find early-game success.

Well yeah, because she doesn't do anything, her ult is pretty much useless.
Does anyone else find with Ahri that her W doesn't actually target champions properly/well? I find Swains flock does, but agri's doesn't and I find myself not bothering to use it..

I am very disappointed with what they have done to {{champion:34}} now. She has been balanced since her creation and now they change her up for no reason at all and have to correct her twice in 2 patches. She is no longer the champ I know and love because of how underpowered she is now and I would know as she's been my only main for many years...
shame Taliyah is trash and no one even plays her.. lol rip rito nice try{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Why does the Leona figure cost less then the Tibbers plush toy when it takes so much more work, because it really questions why Tibbers (plush toy) is bloody expensive at 30 USD($). My mind is saying- F**king riot......

YEY RITO U LISTENED TO ME!
* Fixed a false error message that occurred when entering a game lobby

this has nothing to do with the update unless /remake came out in 6.10, anyways my beef is, why make a /remake for ranked when no one accepts it, i mean just had a game, ekko top was going well until his net "crashed" for 10 mins, Miss Fortunes adc bot was afk for 2:45mins at the start then goes afk 15 mins in for 10 mins, the whole time Kat, myself and Taliyah trying to remake but 2 people dont accept because they are afk? it didnt work, both Ekko and MF came back after the 10 mins of afk to refuse /remake, telling the team they can win it, they came back to feed and complain about net issues,

the list goes on with this game, fix the fucking dam game to how people like it not just the regulars putting there 2 cents worth in, ask everyone what they want, give people what they want, like FAIR RANKED SYSTEMS for 1, AFK punishable by accounts being banned, people feeding, abusing others, using third party "hax", being an A.I in ranked, seriously guys we know you have sold out to china or who ever but seriously you were a good game once, may as well be an unloyal gamer and change platforms and games all together. FIX YOUR SHIT OR LOSE "CUSTOMERS"

Fizz shark can no longer be qss'd, not like he was strong enough and played enough already. Just another way for the adc to get destroyed and not be able to do anything about it. Good thinking rito :^)
This patch shows that RITO has lost the plot worse than ever.
Actually, it shows that Riot really just hates adc's. Just like everyone but adc's.
It had to be done. I mean, with a Fizz ult, it IS dodgeable. But with every other Ult that QSS removed, it had to be changed so it only cleanses actual CC.
Glad to be a tanky top/jungle main with all these "we want you to nuke their Adc mains" changes"
My brother I feel you. Did you also feel the pain of Season 4 jungle changes with me?
No mention of the other bugs surrounding Annie's ultimate (in regard to it actually stunning/doing damage). Cool, thanks riot.
I believe you are just missing it every time.{{summoner:14}}
It's definitely not a miss, there are videos all over the web of the bug..
Good. Annie doesn't need a buff. She requires next to no skill. Support Annie is a Dark Horse but omfg why does a support deal that much damage? It's just not ok.
next champ a yordle confirmed in the riot girl trist in the crowd on the right of her gun(unlees its meant to be twitch).
lol thats samsung twitch
you rekt him ay
because he is banned in every game in high elo.
Because he has insane damage and can get easily fed.

Exactly why I play him. His ult is on a short enough cooldown to be able to disengage whenever you get ganked by an Udyr, Yi, etc. and even if he dies a lot, he just has to get enough gold for RoA, Swiftness, and Rylai's then its GG.

I'm confused as to how this mastery system works

i got level 6 from giving 500 blue essence and i now have 560 blue essence to get to level 7 but that cost 600 blues

So the other 2 options are that i get either a champion shard or permanent champion shard and fuse with them. I thought these were the same thing (just a specific champion from hextech chest) 

So can anybody actually explain how i get my level 7 mastery? becuz fk watchin brofresco and fuck dumping money into hextech chests
wait so i have to dump money into mystery chests to get a mastery score? wtf
Yeaaaah you kinda do....
Why is it now with the new patch that every time i get a key fragment it doesn't actually give me the fragments?
welcome to the league of anime

They should make cleanse better making it do the same thing that the old qss did which was remove all debuffs. There isn't much sense to picking cleanse because of qss and buffing it would make it a better option against assassins like zed and fizz.
